sentences.en: And all those everyday consumer products, which owe their existence, in no small part, to manufacturing methods that wouldn’t work without Einstein’s enunciation of the atomic theory of matter.
sentences.cn: 还有所有那些日常消费品。 其存在在很大程度上都得归功于那样一些制造方法，没有爱因斯坦对物质的原子理论的阐明，就不会有这些制造方法。

sentences.en: Be good at communicating, sense of responsibility, the work is careful, the enunciation is clear.
sentences.cn: 善于沟通, 责任心强, 工作细致, 口齿清晰.

sentences.en: But the bare enunciation of such an absurdity as this last renders refutation superfluous.
sentences.cn: 但是,对这类荒诞性如此直白的表述最终便反驳变得多余.

sentences.en: He is always willing to enunciate his opinions on the subject of politics.
sentences.cn: 他总是愿意对政治问题发表意见.>enunciation/I9nQnsI5eIFn; I9nQnsI`eFEn/n[C,U].

sentences.en: Words offer the means to meaning and for those who will listen enunciation of truth.
sentences.cn: 言论是表达意见的方式,它向那些有心倾听的人传达真相.

trans.tran_cn: 清晰的发音，表明，宣言，口齿
